channel.title: Help me plz with client
channel.description:
Hi i made a client like it says in the tutorial and when i run it i get this error
SaveByte enabled. Open class44 to alter saving or loading. error saving P11_FULL.DAT error saving INDEX.DAT-null error saving P12_FULL.DAT error saving INDEX.DAT-null error saving B12_FULL.DAT error saving INDEX.DAT-null error saving Q8_FULL.DAT error saving INDEX.DAT-null error saving TITLE.DAT Error: loaderror Starting up 20 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4674) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140) at client.run(client.java:4454) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
and the client comes up with this "sorry and error has occured whilist loading world of pk"
